name: Spaceship Shipping
description:
Spaceship Shipping was started back in May 2020 and crawled towards being another forgotten side project until I found the Finally Finish Something Game Jam here on itch. There are lots of things that I wish I had done differently and features that I wish I had included in the game but I needed to finalise the project and leave it in a state where I was happy with what I had created. 

Spaceship Shipping is available in the browser via Itch.io and Android via the Google Play Store but I'd strongly recommend the Android version if that option is available to you as it's the target form factor I had in mind when developing.

You can get the Android version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Skeldev.SpaceshipShipping

In Spaceship Shipping you must pilot your Spaceship through challenging puzzle levels while tackling killer obstacles.

With limited fuel available you'll need to fly smart in order to successfully deliver your package to the delivery point.

Manoeuvre around spinning platforms, dodge flaming meteors, and try avoid getting sucked into the black holes.

Thanks for giving my game a go.
